dict.string: FreeUp needs administrator access to clean system files and free up disk space.
FreeUp needs access to your Desktop folder to scan for files that can be cleaned.
FreeUp needs access to your Documents folder to scan for files that can be cleaned.
FreeUp needs access to your Downloads folder to scan for files that can be cleaned.
FreeUp needs access to removable volumes to scan for files that can be cleaned.
FreeUp needs to send Apple Events to empty the Trash.
